about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

name: python-framel
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-framel
    version: 8.40.1
source:
    sha256: ea4afcdf839f8eb49edc2d3190b5aebb08871146e426b644887f7efbae30a6b9
    url: http://software.igwn.org/sources/source/framel-8.40.1.tar.xz
build:
    number: 0
    string: py37h03ebfcd_0
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_5
        - binutils_linux-64 2.34 hc952b39_20
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h516909a_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.2 hecda079_0
        - cmake 3.17.0 h28c56e5_0
        - expat 2.2.9 he1b5a44_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 hd420e75_6
        - gcc_linux-64 7.5.0 h09487f9_20
        - krb5 1.17.1 h2fd8d38_0
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_5
        - libcurl 7.69.1 hf7181ac_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h46ee950_0
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - libuv 1.38.0 h516909a_0
        - make 4.3 h516909a_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_llvm
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.2 hecda079_0
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_5
        - libblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libffi 3.2.1 he1b5a44_1007
        - libframel 8.40.1 h516909a_0
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgfortran-ng 7.5.0 hdf63c60_6
        - liblapack 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.9 h5ec1e0e_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - llvm-openmp 10.0.0 hc9558a2_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - numpy 1.14.6 py37h95a1406_1201
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_0
        - python 3.7.6 h8356626_5_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 hf8c457e_0
        - sqlite 3.30.1 hcee41ef_0
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    run:
        - libframel 8.40.1 h516909a_0
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - numpy >=1.14.6,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
test:
    commands:
        - 'python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal;
            import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path(''data'') / ''test.gwf''),
            ''D1''); framel.frputvect(''test2.gwf'', [{''name'': ''A1:TEST'', ''data'':
            indata[0], ''start'': indata[1], ''dx'': indata[3], ''x_unit'': indata[4],
            ''y_unit'': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d(''test2.gwf'',
            ''A1:TEST''); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], ''read-write data
            mismatch''); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], ''read-write metadata mismatch'';
            "

            '
    imports:
        - framel
    source_files:
        - data/test.gwf
about:
    description: 'A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave

        Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.

        The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation

        including file input/output.

        This package provides the python bindings.'
    home: http://lappweb.in2p3.fr/virgo/FrameL/
    license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
    license_family: LGPL
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: LIGO/Virgo Frame Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    feedstock-name: framel
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod

about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

commands: python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal; import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path('data') / 'test.gwf'), 'D1'); framel.frputvect('test2.gwf', [{'name': 'A1:TEST', 'data': indata[0], 'start': indata[1], 'dx': indata[3], 'x_unit': indata[4], 'y_unit': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d('test2.gwf', 'A1:TEST'); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], 'read-write data mismatch'); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], 'read-write metadata mismatch'; "
